scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd front-end && npm install" "cd back-end && npm install"
scripts.build-all: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run build" "cd back-end && npm run build"
scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run start" "cd back-end && npm run start"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run build-front && npm run start-all
